activities: NCS Pearson, Inc. through its Pearson VUE and Certiport businesses are under contract to perform global computer-based testing and assessment services on behalf of assessment, certification, licensure, and academic admission testing program owners and ourselves; and through its Pearson Credential Management business that is under contract to provide verification services to third parties including current and potential employers and background checking firms.  We receive and process personal information from individuals located in Switzerland for purposes of providing testing, assessment, verification, and related services on behalf of our global testing program owners.
recoursemech: NCS Pearson commits to cooperation with the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
